docs.introduction.md: Project introduction and overview - explain what your project does and why it's useful
docs.installation.md: Installation and setup instructions for your project across different platforms

steps: 1. Copy this template to your project directory
2. Edit template.config.json with your project details
3. Run 'node setup.js' to apply variables to all files
4. Update docs/navigation.json with your documentation structure
5. Replace placeholder content in docs/ folder with your actual documentation
6. Customize branding and colors in template.config.json
7. Test locally by opening index.html in your browser or using a local server
8. Deploy to GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, or your preferred hosting platform
post_setup: - Remove template.config.json and setup.js if desired
- Update .gitignore to exclude any build artifacts
- Set up automated deployment if using CI/CD
